item.title: ‘The Office’ Spinoff ‘The Paper’ Renewed Ahead of Premiere
item.description: Peacock’s follow-up mockumentary series from Greg Daniels and Michael Koman, starring Domhnall Gleeson and Sabrina Impacciatore, releases all episodes on Thursday.
